name: Park Caretaker
description:
You are a park caretaker. Use different tools to make the park look good and guests happy, clean the trash with a broom, repair broken equipment with a hammer, remove molehills with a shovel and scare off the vandals with your whistle. If a guest sees a piece of trash or a broken bench/trash can, his happiness falls down. At the end of the day, your park is rated and you can buy new upgrades with your earnings.

IMPORTANT NOTICE

If you experience misplacement of cursor in cleaning/repairing phase using web version please press ESC and then click where crosshair is. Desktop version doesn't have this issue.

Controls:

1-5 - change tools
W A S D - movement
LMB - use selected tool
RMB - leave drone
Q/E - previous/next tool
